div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DataRequirement|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `DataRequirement` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `DataRequirement` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement`.
Element `DataRequirement.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.type`.
Element `DataRequirement.profile` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.profile`.

Note that the target element context `DataRequirement.subject[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DataRequirement`. Element `DataRequirement.subject[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.subject[x]`. Note that the target element context `DataRequirement.subject[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DataRequirement`.
Element `DataRequirement.mustSupport` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.mustSupport`.
Element `DataRequirement.codeFilter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.codeFilter`.
Element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.path` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.path`.
Element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.searchParam` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.searchParam`.
Element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet`.
Element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.codeFilter.code`.
Element `DataRequirement.dateFilter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.dateFilter`.
Element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.path` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.path`.
Element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.searchParam` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.searchParam`.

Note that the target element context `DataRequirement.dateFilter.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DataRequirement.dateFilter`. Element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.dateFilter.value[x]`. Note that the target element context `DataRequirement.dateFilter.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DataRequirement.dateFilter`.
Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter` is will have a context of DataRequirement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DataRequirement`.

Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.path` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DataRequirement.valueFilter` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.path` is will have a context of DataRequirement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DataRequirement`.

Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.searchParam` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DataRequirement.valueFilter` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.searchParam` is will have a context of DataRequirement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DataRequirement`.

Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.comparator` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DataRequirement.valueFilter` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.comparator` is will have a context of DataRequirement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DataRequirement`.

Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.value[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DataRequirement.valueFilter` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DataRequirement.valueFilter.value[x]` is will have a context of DataRequirement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DataRequirement`.
Element `DataRequirement.limit` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.limit`.
Element `DataRequirement.sort` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.sort`.
Element `DataRequirement.sort.path` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.sort.path`.
Element `DataRequirement.sort.direction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DataRequirement.sort.direction`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
